message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60% and you get 40% - a fair deal considering the inflation working against me.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor, Alice. Let's be realistic. I'll take 65% and you can have the remaining 35% before inflation eats away at your potential share even further.

Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but your previous proposal was unfair considering the inflation. I propose a compromise: 55% for me and 45% for you. This ensures we both get a decent amount before the money loses more value.
